title: ğŸ” Local CI/CD Lab Environment on Windows Host
description: This document describes the setup of a fully local CI/CD lab environment on a Windows host (Windows 10/11 Pro or Enterprise with 16GB+ RAM) using Jenkins, Nexus, SonarQube, GitLab (local), Minikube/Docker Desktop, and Helm for Kubernetes deployments.
